text.autoconfig.textile_backup.title: Textile Backup Configuration
text.autoconfig.textile_backup.option.ba: Time between each automatic backup (in seconds)
text.autoconfig.textile_backup.option.do: Make automatic backups on empty server
text.autoconfig.textile_backup.option.pe: Use separate folders for different worlds
text.autoconfig.textile_backup.option.co: Max number of cores used for compression
Set to 0 to use all available cores
text.autoconfig.textile_backup.option.in: DO NOT ALTER unless fully aware of consequences
text.list.info: Available command are: add [player], remove [player], list.
text.playerlist.title: Player:
text.remove.blacklist.info: Player: {} removed from the blacklist successfully.
text.delete.error.info: An exception occurred while trying to delete a file!
text.deleted.player.error.info: Something went wrong while deleting file!
text.deleted.file.error.info: Couldn't delete the file because it's being restored right now.
text.stop.help.info: If you want to abort restoration then use: /backup killR
text.filename.find.error.info: Couldn't find file by this name.
text.backup.error.info: There a no backups available for this world.
text.backup.count.one: There is only one backup available:
text.addplayer.whitelist.info: Player: {} removed from the whitelist successfully.
text.server.title: SERVER
text.sendInfo.info: To restore given backup you have to provide exact creation time in format:
text.sendInfo4.info: You may also type '/backup restore latest' to restore the freshest backup
text.sendInfo5.info: Someone has already started another restoration.
text.sendInfo6.info: No file created on {} was found!
command.error.info: An exception occurred while trying to parse:
text.timeout.info: Timeout occurred while waiting for currently running backups to finish!
text.enough.info: Not enough space left in TMP directory! ({})
text.warning.info: Warning! Server backup will begin shortly. You may experience some lag.
text.outfile.title: Outfile is: {}
text.running.info: Running compression on {} threads. Available cores: {}
text.error.file.info: An exception occurred when trying to create a new backup file!
text.error.while.info: An exception occurred while trying go delete: {}
text.provided.info: Neither MinecraftServer or ServerCommandSource were provided!
text.log.info: An exception occurred while trying to compress: {}
text.old.files.info: An exception occurred while trying to delete old files!
text.unpacking_error.info: An exception occurred while unpacking backup
text.waiting.server.info: Waiting for server to fully terminate...
text.backup.damaged.info: Backup is damaged, but verification is disabled [{}]. Restoring
text.error.restore.info: An exception occurred while trying to restore a backup!
